StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetChangeRequestsForNwa]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NWAID int)
AS
SELECT cr.[ID], cr.[NWA_ID], cr.[SUBMITTED_ON], crs.[DESCRIPTION] STATUS_DESC, cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID], crt.[DESCRIPTION] TYPE_DESC, crl_c.[DESCRIPTION] CURRENT_LEVEL_DESC, crl_f.[DESCRIPTION] FINAL_LEVEL_DESC, cr.[MODIFIED_ON], cr.[MODIFIED_BY] FROM [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST] cr LEFT JOIN [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_LEVEL] crl_f ON crl_f.[ID] = cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_LEVEL_ID_FINAL] LEFT JOIN [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_LEVEL] crl_c ON crl_c.[ID] = cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_LEVEL_ID_CURRENT] LEFT JOIN [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_STATUS] crs ON crs.[ID] = cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_STATUS_ID] LEFT JOIN [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_TYPE] crt ON crt.[ID] = cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID] WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NWAID ORDER BY cr.[SUBMITTED_ON] DESC
